Articles.Content:
It's Shark week on the Discovery channel.

Therefore I challenge ye artistically inclined to create an SSTO with the appearance of a Megalodon shark. It must achieve orbit and "eat" (dock?) a smaller manned vessel.

Pictures a must, video preferred. Now all we need is a Kerbal named Snuffy...

Edited August 5, 2013 by Whackjob
Dosent this belong in the challenges section?

I like to put it in general first. When you're picking out booth space in a convention, you want to be on the path that has the most foot traffic. If you're in the little cul-de-sac with the guy selling snake jerky, you probably aren't gonna give away even a single pamphlet.
Lots of people read the challenges section. You can sell your sharkonnastick here just fine.
